title: The Crucifixion and Resurrection
summary: On the third day, women find Jesusâ€™ tomb empty and hear from an angel that He has risen. Jesus appears to His followers and sends them out to preach the gospel. He ascends into heaven, confirming His victory over death.

faq.question: What is a key message in Mark 16?
faq.answer: It emphasizes the servant nature of Jesus and the power of faith in action.

faq.question: What does Mark 16 reveal about Jesus?
faq.answer: It shows His authority, compassion, and call to follow Him wholeheartedly.
